description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget 'MyBookingsPage' that displays a user's court bookings. It handles authentication state, loads bookings using a provider, and renders different UI states such as loading, error, no bookings, and a list of bookings.

classes.name: MyBookingsPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays the user's bookings.

classes.name: _MyBookingsPageState
classes.description: State class for MyBookingsPage that manages initialization and builds the UI based on authentication and booking state.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, checks if the user is authenticated, and loads bookings if so.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree based on authentication status, loading state, error state, and list of bookings.
